description:
Designed to hit the ground running, our recycled polyester Peak to Pavement styles were made to perform. Sweat wicking and sun protective, they’re ready for any hike, trail run, or training session you throw at them.

About that… We see the Peak to Pavement Shorts for men making an appearance anywhere and everywhere. And with a quick dry fabric, you won't worry if they get a little wet. The obvious short of choice for active days? You bet.
name: Prana Peak To Pavement Shorts, 6" Inseam - Mens
